author: SohamBhattacharya
body: #### PR description: This PR switches to TICLv4 for offline HGCAL electrons and photons. The following plots were obtained using these samples: - `SingleElectron_Pt-2To200-gun/PhaseIISpring22DRMiniAOD-PU200_123X_mcRun4_realistic_v11-v1/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW-MINIAOD` - `SinglePhoton_Pt-2To200-gun/PhaseIISpring22DRMiniAOD-PU200_123X_mcRun4_realistic_v11-v1/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW-MINIAOD` Expected consequences: * The electron reco efficiency should increase: * The photon reco efficiency should increase: * The electron mis-reco (i.e. reco electrons not $\Delta R$ matched to any gen-electron) efficiency should not change much: * The photon mis-reco (i.e. reco-photons not $\Delta R$ matched to any gen-photons) efficiency should not change much: * The electron and photon energy responses (recoE/genE) should remain fairly the same. @swagata87 @rovere @felicepantaleo
title: Switch to TICLv4 for offline HGCAL electrons and photons
